Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-26465 affecting package openssh for versions less than 8.9p1-7
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-26465 affecting package openssh for versions less than 8.9p1-7. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package openssh is earlier than 8.9p1-7, affected by CVE-2025-26465
